get_users: SELECT u.id AS user_id, u.full_name, u.phone, u.email, u.join_date, u.membership_end_date, u.role, d.id AS dog_id, d.name AS dog_name, d.breed, d.sex, d.birth_date, d.chip_number FROM users u LEFT JOIN dogs d ON u.id = d.user_id WHERE u.role = 'владелец' ORDER BY u.full_name, d.name;
get_events: SELECT id, title, category, status, start_at, end_at, venue, price, description FROM events WHERE start_at > CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ORDER BY start_at;
get_programs: SELECT p.id, p.title, p.type, p.price, p.description, COUNT(pr.dog_id) AS registered_dogs_count FROM programs p LEFT JOIN program_registrations pr ON p.id = pr.program_id GROUP BY p.id, p.title, p.type, p.price, p.description ORDER BY p.type, p.title;
get_people_events: SELECT id, title, category, status, start_at, end_at, venue, price, description FROM events WHERE category = 'Образование' AND end_at <= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ORDER BY start_at DESC;
get_chiped: SELECT d.id AS dog_id, d.name AS dog_name, d.breed, d.sex, d.birth_date, d.chip_number, u.full_name AS owner_name, u.phone AS owner_phone, u.email AS owner_email FROM dogs d JOIN users u ON d.user_id = u.id ORDER BY u.full_name, d.name;
